name: Gravity Well (itch) (SakuraCrowned)
description:
A short little puzzle platformer I made my senior year of college to learn how to program in C# and Visual Studio myself! Gravity Well is a puzzle platformer where you maneuver around levels to a goal by manipulating and rotating segments of the environment around you. Made slowly over a month or two.  Probably still has a few bugs including a super laggy level 7 and missing level 15 but other than that its a pretty finished concept I'm happy with for now!

May one day soon elaborate and create a more convoluted game out of this idea now that I'm more comfortable with C# and Unity!
